Item.name: ScriptCode
Item.value: //// Collapse all bookmarks //// Author: Chun Tian (binghe) <binghe.lisp@gmail.com> //// Version: 1.0 function CollapseBookmarks(bkm, nLevel) { if (bkm.children != null) { for (var i = 0; i < bkm.children.length; i++) { bkm.children[i].open = false; CollapseBookmarks(bkm.children[i], nLevel + 1); } } } // console.clear(); console.show(); // console.println("Collapsed all bookmarks in the document."); CollapseBookmarks(this.bookmarkRoot, 0);
